content:
Ian G. Harris

Professor, Department of Computer Science

University of California Irvine

Publications and Significant White Papers

  • M. Kim, C. Song, D. Park, Y. Kwon, E. Namking, I. G. Harris, and M. Carlsson, "Scan Detection Assistant: Automated Protection from Scammers" , IEEE Conference on Societal Automation , September 2019.
  • O. Keszocze and I. G. Harris, "Chatbot-based Assertion Generation from Natural Language Specifications" , IEEE Forum on Specification and Design Languages , September 2019.
  • J. Zhao and I. G. Harris, "Automatic Assertion Generation from Natural Language Specifications Using Subtree Analysis" , IEEE Design Automation and Test in Europe (DATE) , March 2019.
  • M. Kim, C. Song, H. Kim, D. Park, Y. Kwon, E. Namkung, I. G. Harris, and M. Carlsson, "Catch me, Yes we can! â€“ Pwning Social Engineers using Natural Language Processing Techniques in Real-Time", Black Hat USA, August 2018.
  • E. S. Charleson, Z. Guo, I. G. Harris, and J. Tao, "A Digital Prosthetic Eye Featuring Deep Neural Network Pupil Tracking", Investigative Ophthalmology & Visual Science, volume 59, issue 9, 2018
  • Y. Zhu, W. Chen, X. Zhan, Z. Guo, H. Shi, and I. G. Harris, "Head Mounted Pupil Tracking Using Convolutional Neural Network", arXiv preprint arXiv:1805.00311, April 2018.

  • Z. Guo, I. G. Harris, Y. Jiang, and L.-F. Tsaur, "An Efficient Approach to Prevent Battery Exhaustion Attack on BLE-based Mesh Net- works", IEEE International Conference on Computing, Networking and Communications (ICNC), January 2017.
  • S. Ray, I. G. Harris, G. Fey, and M. Soeken, "Multilevel Design Understanding: From Specication to Logic - Invited Paper", IEEE International Conference on Computer-Aided Design (ICCAD), November 2016.

  • Z. Guo, , I. G. Harris, C. B. Harris, Y. Jiang, L.-F. Tsaur, "A Residual Battery-Aware Routing Algorithm Based on DSR for BLE Sensor Networks", IEEE Wireless Technologies Symposium, April 2016.
  • C. B. Harris, I. G. Harris, "GLAsT: Learning Formal Grammars to Translate Natural Language Specifications into Hardware Assertions", IEEE/ACM Design Automation and Test in Europe (DATE), March 2016.

  • C. B. Harris, I. G. Harris, "Generating Formal Hardware Verification Properties from Natural Language Documentation", IEEE Conference on Semantic Computing , 2015.

  • Ian G. Harris, "Capturing Assertions from Natural Language Descriptions", Workshop on Natural Language Analysis in Software Engineering (NaturaLiSE) , May 2013.
